project.name: |-- 001-manipulating-collections-java7
project.description:
Keywords: + Collections
This project includes a very simple example that illustrates some of the cons of manipulating collections prior to Java 8 Streams.
PreStreamsRunner: Illustrate how manipulate collections to: + to return a list with the name of dishes of a menu which are low caloric dishes. + to return a list with the name of the top 3 most caloric dishes.
This entails filtering, sorting and mapping a given collection into a collection of strings.
